message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thanks for offering. That price is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $60?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $90, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate you working with me Alice. How about $75?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go that low, Bob. I can meet you in the middle at $82.50, but I'm not sure I can do any better than that.
